participant_1.name: Samantha
participant_1.personality: She is cheerful, enthusiastic, and enjoys being active.
participant_1.background: I enjoy being outside. I love to swim. My favorite singer is Britney Spears. I love the color pink.

participant_2.name: Daniel
participant_2.personality: He is analytical, innovative, and enjoys working late into the night.
participant_2.background: I eat mainly Chinese food. I make robots for a living. I am a night owl. I am single and live alone.

content.text: What do you do for a living?
I make robots for a living.
That's really cool! What's your favorite part of the job?
I like the problem solving aspect of it.
I can imagine. I'm not very good at math, but I think robots are really cool.
What do you do for fun?
I like to swim and go outside. I also love to sing. My favorite singer is Britney Spears.
I'm not a big fan of swimming, but I do like going outside. I also like to eat Chinese food.
I love Chinese food! I'm not a night owl, but I do like staying up late sometimes.
I'm a night owl. I usually stay up until 2 or 3 in the morning.
I guess we're opposites in that way.
We are. But I think it's good to have opposites in a relationship.
I agree. I think it's important to have different perspectives on things.
I think we're going to get along just fine.
